name: Welcome Email
subject: Welcome to Suprans - Your Business Setup Partner
content:
Dear {{name}},

Thank you for your interest in Suprans. We are delighted to assist you with your business setup requirements in the UAE.

Our team of experts specializes in:
- Company Formation (Mainland & Free Zone)
- Trade License Services
- PRO & Visa Services
- Business Banking

I will be your dedicated point of contact and will reach out shortly to understand your requirements.

Best regards,
{{agent_name}}
Suprans Business Services

name: Follow-up Email
subject: Following up on your business setup inquiry
content:
Dear {{name}},

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on our recent conversation about your business setup requirements.

As discussed, I have attached the relevant information for your review. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
{{agent_name}}

name: WhatsApp Introduction
content: Hi {{name}}! This is {{agent_name}} from Suprans. Thank you for your inquiry about {{service}}. I would be happy to assist you. When would be a good time for a quick call to discuss your requirements?

name: Proposal Follow-up
subject: Your Business Setup Proposal - Next Steps
content:
Dear {{name}},

I hope you had a chance to review the proposal we sent for {{service}}.

I wanted to check if you have any questions or require any clarifications. Our team is ready to proceed as soon as you are comfortable.

Key highlights of our proposal:
- Competitive pricing
- End-to-end support
- Quick turnaround time

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
{{agent_name}}
